30.87.text:
for Michael Crichton's "Jurassic

34.03.text:
of the most seen
images of the 1990s.

36.83.text:

about the design process,

39.57.text:
the future of the book
publishing industry,

42.13.text:
and about his award-winning
novel, "The Cheese Monkeys,"

45.33.text:
which is loosely based on
his years at Penn State.

48.53.text:
Here's our conversation
with Chip Kidd...
